title: United States - lasting of love in a relationship in 2019
summary: Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 2_to_5_years to 6_to_10_years, gradually increasing from 6_to_10_years to A_lifetime, and lastly roughly constant from A_lifetime to Less_than_two_years.
The line drastically increased by 25.7 times from Year 6_to_10_years to A_lifetime, and lastly, remained stable by 38.5 times from Year A_lifetime to Less_than_two_years.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 77.0 was reported at Year A_lifetime
The lowest Share of respondents, of value 2.0 was reported at Year Less_than_two_years
